DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether copeptin levels increase upon a psychological stress (i.e. written examination) and whether copeptin levels measured immediately before the written examination predict success of the examination.
DOC.brief_title: Copeptin as a Stress Marker During a Written Examination
DOC.criteria: Age over 18 years Member of 4th year in medical course at Basel University Intake of any medication (except birth control pill) BMI over 30kg/m2 Evidence of acute disease History of chronic illness, including chronic psychiatric disease Anamnestic certain or assumed pregnancy Regularly smoking students
